description:
# BTW there is not nextcloud client on Ubuntu Software.
# Add this to your repo 
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nextcloud-devs/client
sudo apt update

# Then,
sudo apt install nextcloud-client

# You will need an account to a Nextcloud server.
